description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation And Research, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Unicef Capacity For Programming On Gender. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Cross - Sectoral

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Over 83% of activities planned in the UNICEF Comoros Office&39;s integrated monitoring and evaluation plan (IMEP) was implemented.UNICEF continued to strengthen planning and monitoring mechanisms for the UNDAF programme implementation, as well as the CO programme.Quality assurance was provided so that high quality donor reports were submitted on time, and an international consultant was hired to support the Office in the production of annual report documents (RAM and COAR). UNICEF also developed a new programme document (CPD) for the 2022–2026 period. The CO also supported the National Institute of Statistics with the MICS survey in 2021. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:11/01/2022
